name: Healthy & Delicious: Italian Egg-Drop Soup
description: Italian Egg-Drop Soup, adapted from Eating Well, should start your resolution in the right direction. Surprisingly hearty and super delicious, it's also a powerhouse of fiber and protein that comes together in under 30 minutes. Not to mention, it will feed an invading army of lifestyle changers.
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch scallions, sliced, whites and greens divided
3 cups chopped spinach, Swiss chard, or arugula, stems removed

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot or Dutch oven, combine broth, water, pasta, chickpeas, scallions, and nutmeg over high heat. Cover. Once mixture comes to a boil, uncover and cook 3 to 4 minutes. Add leafy greens. Stir. Cook 1 minute. Drop heat to a simmer. Slowly pour eggs in soup, stirring constantly. Cook 2 minutes. Season with pepper. Add scallions and lemon juice. Serve with Parmesan sprinkled on top.
